radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral otomastoiditis with auditory ossicles and partial paranasal sinusitis.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: After relapse, head enhanced MRI and CT angiography (CTA) revealed no significant abnormalities, except for the presence of bilateral otomastoiditis and right maxillary sinusitis.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Bilateral otomastoiditis and right maxillary sinus inflammation.
